subject: Photography
title: Stock Photography's Transformation
description: A short lesson to help you apply Stock Photography's Transformation.

hook.text: A handshake in a boardroom. A woman laughing at salad. Stock photography is everywhere ‚Äî and everyone mocks it.

buildup.text: Stock photography provides licensed images for commercial use: ads, websites, magazines, presentations.

discovery.text: Digital distribution collapsed prices. Images that cost hundreds now sell for dollars on platforms like Shutterstock.

twist.text: AI can now generate stock-style images on demand. Human stock photographers face existential competition.

climax.text: Stock photography evolved from a lucrative niche to a commodified industry ‚Äî a preview of AI's impact on creative work.

punchline.text: Stock photography: first laughed at, now threatened by robots.

quiz.question: What disrupted the stock photography industry most recently?
options: AI image generation that can create stock-style images on demand
